projects.title: Residential Attic Exclusion - Jackson
projects.description: Complete bat exclusion and attic restoration for a historic Jackson home. Sealed 12 entry points and installed one-way exclusion devices.

images.caption: Heavy guano accumulation in attic space before cleanup
One-way exclusion tubes allowing bats to exit safely
Complete attic restoration with new insulation

projects.title: Commercial Building Seal - Teton Village
projects.description: Large-scale exclusion work on a multi-story commercial building. Sealed roof line gaps and installed permanent barriers.

images.caption: Multiple entry points discovered along roof line

projects.title: Historic Cabin Restoration - Wilson
projects.description: Delicate exclusion work preserving the historic character of a 1920s log cabin while effectively preventing bat re-entry.

images.caption: 1920s log cabin requiring sensitive restoration approach
Natural log settling created numerous entry points
Period-appropriate materials used for permanent exclusion

projects.title: Warehouse Exclusion - Alpine
projects.description: Industrial-scale bat exclusion from a large warehouse facility. Addressed multiple species and extensive roosting areas.

images.caption: Large bat colony in warehouse rafters
Specialized netting system for large industrial spaces

projects.title: Multi-Family Housing - Driggs
projects.description: Coordinated exclusion work across multiple connected residential units. Comprehensive approach ensuring no cross-contamination.

images.caption: Multi-unit residential complex requiring coordinated approach
Sealing shared wall spaces to prevent movement between units
All units successfully excluded with warranty coverage

projects.title: Emergency Exclusion - Moose
projects.description: Rapid-response exclusion work for a family dealing with bats in living spaces. Same-day service with complete resolution.

images.caption: Emergency situation with bats in main living areas
Same-day exclusion devices installed for immediate relief
